kw.name: Connect To Database
kw.msg: Connect to DB using : psycopg2.connect(database='smartbit', user='postgres', password=***, host='localhost', port=5432)

kw.name: Execute Sql String
kw.msg:
Executing sql:
WITH new_account AS (INSERT INTO accounts (name, email, cpf) VALUES ('Jonas Brother', 'jonas.brother@test.com', '36183858030') RETURNING id) INSERT INTO memberships (account_id, plan_id, credit_card, price, status) SELECT id, 1, '4242', 99.99, true FROM new_account;
kw.arg: WITH new_account AS (INSERT INTO accounts (name, email, cpf) VALUES ('${name}', '${email}', '${cpf}') RETURNING id) INSERT INTO memberships (account_id, plan_id, credit_card, price, status) SELECT id, ${plan_id}, '${card}', ${price}, true FROM new_account;
kw.doc: Executes the ``sql_string`` as a single SQL command.

kw.doc: Disconnects from the database.
